verses.verse: In the year <WH8141> of King <WH4428> Uzziah's death, <WH4194> I saw <WH7200> the Lord <WH136> sitting <WH3427> on a throne, <WH3678> lofty <WH7311> and exalted, <WH5375> with the train <WH7757> of His robe <WH7757> filling <WH4390> the temple. <WH1964>

Seraphim <WH9633> stood <WH5975> above <WH4605> Him, each <WH259> having six <WH8337> wings; <WH3671> with two <WH8147> he covered <WH3680> his face, <WH6440> and with two <WH8147> he covered <WH3680> his feet, <WH7272> and with two <WH8147> he flew. <WH5774>

And one <WH2088> called <WH7121> out to another <WH2088> and said, <WH559> "Holy, <WH6918> Holy, <WH6918> Holy, <WH6918> is the Lord <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> The whole <WH3605> earth <WH776> is full <WH4393> of His glory. <WH9202>"
And the foundations <WH9020> of the thresholds <WH5592> trembled <WH5128> at the voice <WH6963> of him who called <WH7121> out, while the temple <WH1004> was filling <WH4390> with smoke. <WH6227>

Then I said, <WH559> "Woe <WH188> is me, for I am ruined! <WH1820> Because <WH3588> I am a man <WH376> of unclean <WH2931> lips, <WH8193> And I live <WH3427> among <WH8432> a people <WH5971> of unclean <WH2931> lips; <WH8193> For my eyes <WH5869> have seen <WH7200> the King, <WH4428> the Lord <WH3068> of hosts. <WH6635>"
Then one <WH259> of the seraphim <WH9633> flew <WH5774> to me, with a burning <WH9574> coal <WH9574> in his hand <WH3027> which he had taken <WH3947> from the altar <WH4196> with tongs. <WH4457>

And he touched <WH5060> my mouth <WH6310> [with it] and said, <WH559> "Behold, <WH2009> this <WH2088> has touched <WH5060> your lips; <WH8193> and your iniquity <WH5771> is taken <WH5493> away, <WH5493> and your sin <WH9128> is forgiven. <WH3722>"

Then I heard <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of the Lord, <WH136> saying, <WH559> "Whom <WH4310> shall I send, <WH7971> and who <WH4310> will go <WH1980> for Us?" Then I said, <WH559> "Here <WH2009> am I. Send <WH7971> me!"

And He said, <WH559> "Go, <WH1980> and tell <WH559> this <WH2088> people: <WH5971> 'Keep <WH8085> on listening, <WH8085> but do not perceive; <WH995> Keep <WH7200> on looking, <WH7200> but do not understand. <WH3045>'

"Render <WH8080> the hearts <WH3820> of this <WH2088> people <WH5971> insensitive, <WH8080> Their ears <WH241> dull, <WH3513> And their eyes <WH5869> dim, <WH9619> Lest <WH6435> they see <WH7200> with their eyes, <WH5869> Hear <WH8085> with their ears, <WH241> Understand <WH995> with their hearts, <WH3824> And return <WH7725> and be healed. <WH7495>"

Then I said, <WH559> "Lord, <WH136> how <WH4970> long <WH5704> <WH4970>?" And He answered, <WH559> "Until <WH5704> <WH834> <WH518> cities <WH5892> are devastated <WH7582> [and] without <WH369> inhabitant, <WH3427> Houses <WH1004> are without <WH369> people, <WH120> And the land <WH127> is utterly <WH8077> desolate, <WH8077>
"The Lord <WH3068> has removed <WH7368> men <WH120> far <WH7368> away, And the forsaken <WH5805> places <WH5805> are many <WH7231> in the midst <WH7130> of the land. <WH776>

"Yet <WH5750> there will be a tenth <WH6224> portion <WH6224> in it, And it will again <WH7725> be [subject] to burning, <WH1197> Like a terebinth <WH424> or an oak <WH437> Whose <WH834> stump <WH4676> remains when <WH834> it is felled. <WH7995> The holy <WH6944> seed <WH2233> is its stump. <WH4676>"
